content.rendered:
Taking the extensive size of the home into consideration, an emphasis was placed on creating spaces that were unique in style, while still providing the comfort of an intimate and relaxed environment.

With sprawling limestone floors, the property boasts a custom built industrial grade kitchen, master and guest suites, media room, and recreational facilities. The juxtaposition of modern materials and finishes, with warm, natural elements, give the property a truly unique take on Miami style.
